trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Espone i tipi <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> all'automazione interfaccia utente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> instance that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per l’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.List" /> enumeration value.
Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" />.
The collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome dell’oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
A string that contains "ListView".
A value in the enumeration.
Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per l’elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the view that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> is using.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> per la visualizzazione utilizzata da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" />.

trans-unit.source: Default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> implementation uses the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" />, and this method returns <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListView" /> utilizza il controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridView" /> e questo metodo restituirà <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.IViewAutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
The interface instance that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: L’istanza di interfaccia associata a questo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListViewAutomationPeer" />.
